channel.title: App Store on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in App Store on Damien Saunders

item.title: Android Market has a browser
item.description: Android users tend to download fewer apps â€“ and this is because there is no computer application to easily browse and download apps in the same way that iTunes works for iOS devices. A few weeks back the revamped Android Market website was launched. But it still struggles to tie the phone to the computer. Android Market revamped The Android Market website has been around for a couple of years and generally featured static content.
